#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Weather.

== Name ==

*[CWeather Weather]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Weather (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Store weather condition during play.
			It contains an optional attribute named wind to specify wind condition during play.
			
			See also: SportML has a normalisation of weather types.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...  other = xs:string  wind = [SWindEnum WindEnum]>[Sstring string]</...>

----
          

=== Attributes ===

|| Name || Description || Type || Use || Default || Fixed || Form ||
        
|| other ||  				Alternate value for an attribute.			 || xs:string || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| wind ||   || [SWindEnum golfml:WindEnum] || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CRound Round]
----
    <xs:complexType name="Weather">  <xs:simpleContent>    <xs:extension base="xs:string">      <xs:attribute name="wind" type="golfml:WindEnum"/>      <xs:attributeGroup ref="golfml:Other"/>    </xs:extension>  </xs:simpleContent></xs:complexType>
----
